RuleType.INDIVIDUAL_PERCENT_WITH_ALLOWED_FAILURES: Min. {{requiredPercent}}% of achievable points for each assignment with {{allowedFailures}} allowed failures
RuleType.REQUIRED_PERCENT_OVERALL: Min. {{requiredPercent}}% of achievable points over all assignments

Error.AlreadyInGroupException: Participant is already in a group.

Assessment.AchievedPointsMaxValueExceeded: Achieved point exceeds the maximum amount of possible points.

Error.ConnectionRefused: Failed to connect to the server.
Error.CourseClosedException: Course is closed and therefore can't be changed.
Error.FailedToLoadRequiredData: Failed to load the required data.
Error.Forbidden: You do not have the required permission to perform this action.
Error.GroupsForbiddenException: This course does not allow groups.
Error.NotACourseMemberException: You're not a member of this course.
Error.NotAGroupMemberException: You're not a member of this group.
Error.NotATeachingStaffMember: You're not part of the teaching staff for this course.
Error.NotFound: Failed to find the requested information.
Error.NoAdmissionCriteria: This course did not define any admission criteria.

Custom.AutoJoinedGroup: You were automatically added to group "{{groupName}}".

Misc.AdmissionStatusDisclaimer: This only reflects the current status and not the final admission approval. Future assignments have not been taken into consideration.

Prompt.ContinueWithUnsavedChanges: If you continue, your unsaved changes will be discarded.

Question.RemoveUserFromGroup: Do you really want to remove this user from the group ?

GroupSettings.AutoJoinGroupOnCourseJoined: Automatically assign group to participant after joining the course
GroupSettings.MergeGroupsOnAssignmentStarted: Merge insufficiently big groups when assignment starts

PartialAssessment.Title: Title
PartialAssessment.DraftOnly: Only visible when assessment is a draft

Common.EnterToConfirm: Please enter the following text to confirm

Course.Closed: If the course is closed, joining, creation of new assignments, groups, etc. is not possible.
Course.Id: Id will default to shortname-semeste, if not specified. Will be used in the URL.
Course.Shortname: Shortname of this course. Should be reused every semester (i.e "java").

CourseConfig.AdmissionFromPreviousSemester: Admissions from previous semesters can be entered in the textfield on the left. Every row should contain a single matriculation number. After saving, the selected matriculation numbers will be displayed in the table along with the corresponding student. If the  student is not yet registered in this system, their name won't be displayed.
CourseConfig.Password: Participants must enter the password to join the course.

Dialog.SuggestGroupJoin:
Participation in group assignments requires membership in a group.

If you confirm this action, the system will try to add you into an open group. Should there be no available groups, a new group will be created for you.

Group.CanNotBeClosed: The group cannot be closed by students.
Group.CanNotBeRenamed: This group cannot be renamed by students.
Group.LeaveToJoinOther: Current group must be left to join another group.
Group.NoGroupForAssignment: You currently have no group for this assignment.
Group.NotEnoughMembers: Group must have at least {{minSize}} members.

GroupCreation.NameSchema:
This course is using a predefined prefix for group names.
Group name will be chosen automatically.
GroupCreation.Password: When using a password, other participants are required enter the password to join your group.

GroupSettings.AutoJoinGroupOnCourseJoined:
If no open group exists, a new group will be created.
If name schema is not defined, a random group name will be chosen.
GroupSettings.Prefix: All group names will use the prefix followed by a number.
GroupSettings.SizeMax: Max. amount of allowed group members.
GroupSettings.SizeMin: Group must have this size to participate in assignments.

Text.NotificationDescription:
The Student Management System can notify other systems about certain events (i.e., start of an assignment).
In order to receive these notifications, it must provide an endpoint that listens to HTTP-POST requests.

Configuring subscriptions requires one of the following roles: 
SYSTEM_ADMIN, MGMT_ADMIN or ADMIN_TOOL.

Assessment.Visibility: Students will only be able to view the assessment once the assignment is set to EVALUATED.
Assessment.SelectGroupOrParticipant: Please select a group or participant.

UserSettings.Language: Determines the language of received emails.

BlacklistedEvents.ASSESSMENT_SCORE_CHANGED: Score of an assessment was changed

RegisteredGroups.Comment: Adding or removing a participant or group only affects this assignment. The global group list will remain unchanged.

Tooltip.SelectAssessmentTarget: Select a target for this assessment by pressing the "Select"-button in the Group/User-Table.
